Module ing.sw.ouahidi.miah.longhi

Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp44.server.controller.states

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompoundState
    CompoundState extends State.
    DomeBuildState
    this state allows to compute all the the build actions that the worker can do adding build dome action at every level
    FemaleDomeBuildState
    this state allows to compute all the the build actions that the worker can do adding build dome action at every level
    ForceBackwardsMoveState
    this state allows to compute all the the movements that the worker adding move action to opponents worker's position
    PushMoveState
    this state allows to compute all the the movements that the worker adding move action to opponents worker's position
    SecondBuildState
    this state allows to compute all the the build actions that the worker can do, even no build.
    SimpleBuildState
    this state allows to compute all the the build actions that the worker can do according the active filters
    SimpleMoveState
    this state allows to compute all the the movements that the worker can do according the active filters
    SimpleUnbuildState
    this state allows to compute all the the build actions that the worker can do according the active filters
    State
    The smallest part of player's turn.
    SwapMoveState
    this state allows to compute all the the movements that the worker adding move action to opponents worker's position
